name: Colorspace Pirates
description:
Pilot your Colorspace Ship into battle!

Classic space shooter with a twist- your health and damage are colors, with red, Green, and Blue components. Your attacks are color blending modes. Mix your color with the enemies color to win!

This game was made by AxiAkita and VoxSomniator in about a week for Games Made Quick??? 2.0.
--------------------------------------

Supports keyboard or gamepad input.

Play time is about 5 minutes.

Enjoy!
